it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller.match

Class TurnController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller.match.TurnController

  • public class TurnController
extends Object
    It is responsible for controlling the flow of a single turn.
    • Initial spawn of the player
    • Operation selection
    • Action selection
    • Powerup selection and removal of the cards
    Author:
    Alessandro Fulgini

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TurnController(PlayerTurn turn, Match match, Map<String,PersistentView> views, ControllerFactory factory)
      Creates a new controller for the turn of the match.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void runTurn()
      Runs the turn until it ends because the user has performed all his actions or because he has been suspended.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TurnController

        public TurnController(PlayerTurn turn,
                      Match match,
                      Map<String,PersistentView> views,
                      ControllerFactory factory)
        Creates a new controller for the turn of the match. The match instance must have a current turn with a player associated to it
        Parameters:
        turn - Instance of the turn to be controlled, not null
        match - Instance of the match whose current turn has to be controlled, not null
        views - Map (username, view) with the views of the players, not null
        factory - factory to create the needed controllers, not null
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If any of the parameters is null, if the current turn is null and if the owner of the current turn does not exist

    • Method Detail

      • runTurn

        public void runTurn()
             throws InterruptedException
        Runs the turn until it ends because the user has performed all his actions or because he has been suspended. or PlayerTurnState.SELECTING
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - If the thread gets interrupted
